mapper.select: SELECT schedule_no, schedule_startdate, schedule_enddate, schedule_name, schedule_color, schedule_place FROM tbl_schedule WHERE fk_emp_id = #{fk_emp_id} AND TRUNC(schedule_startdate) = TRUNC(SYSDATE) ORDER BY schedule_startdate

SELECT s.schedule_no, s.schedule_startdate, s.schedule_enddate, s.schedule_name, s.schedule_color, s.schedule_place FROM tbl_schedule s JOIN tbl_employee e ON s.fk_emp_id = e.emp_id WHERE e.fk_dept_id = (SELECT fk_dept_id FROM tbl_employee WHERE emp_id = #{fk_emp_id}) AND TRUNC(s.schedule_startdate) = TRUNC(SYSDATE) ORDER BY s.schedule_startdate

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT n.notice_no AS "notice_no", n.notice_subject AS "notice_subject", e.name AS "name", n.notice_regdate AS "notice_regdate", n.notice_viewcount AS "notice_viewcount" FROM tbl_notice n JOIN tbl_employee e ON n.fk_emp_id = e.emp_id WHERE n.notice_status = 1 ORDER BY n.notice_regdate DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 6

SELECT TO_CHAR(RESULT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS result_day, SUM(RESULT_PRICE) AS total_performance FROM tbl_result WHERE FK_EMP_ID = #{fk_emp_id} AND RESULT_DATE >= TRUNC(SYSDATE) - INTERVAL '6' DAY GROUP BY TO_CHAR(RESULT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY result_day

SELECT e.name AS emp_name, SUM(r.RESULT_PRICE) AS employee_performance, (SELECT SUM(r2.RESULT_PRICE) FROM tbl_result r2 JOIN tbl_employee e2 ON r2.FK_EMP_ID = e2.emp_id WHERE e2.fk_dept_id = e.fk_dept_id) AS department_performance FROM tbl_result r JOIN tbl_employee e ON r.FK_EMP_ID = e.emp_id WHERE e.emp_id = #{empId} GROUP BY e.name, e.fk_dept_id
